scenario_text.value:
Oh, there you are, Miu.
Kaito was looking for you.

What’d I tell ya, Miu? That brother of yours
sure likes to worry.
What do I care?

I understand his concerns, given how things
are right now.

Isn’t it natural for your brother to want to
get along with you?
...Yeah, I guess so.

Even in this weird world, your brother’s
still your brother.
It just kinda bothers me, that’s all.

I see... Still, I’m impressed that this
situation doesn’t rattle a guy like him.
Kaito’s haunted by an evil spirit.
An evil spirit?
Yeah. That’s why he frets over me so much.
Here, Takuma! This is a talisman.
Use it to exorcise the evil spirit.

(I seriously can’t tell what she’s getting
at, as usual.)

(Hmm, maybe I should just go along with it?
Or maybe mediate between her and Kaito?)

(Oh, or what if I let Shakomon handle...
whatever this is?)
(How should I react here?)
Yeah, let’s cast it out!
Take Kaito’s side.
Do it, Shakomon!

Oh, good call! Let’s cast out that evil
spirit!

Yeah! I know a good chant! Namuamidabutsu,
namuamidabutsuuu⁠—
Ack! IT BUUURNS!

Yeek! It worked on you?! B-b-but that means
you’re possessed, too?!
Ooh... Help me...
Hey, stay with us, Takuma!
Takumaaa, I’m sooorryyy!
Uh, it was just a joke, you guys.

Wha’⁠—! You almost gave me a heart attack,
you stupid jerk!
Sorry, sorry...

Hehe, I bet she really thinks this is funny,
anyway.

Hey, Miu? Why don’t you try to see things
from Kaito’s side?
It’s not like he’s doing this out spite.
I...I know that.
Still, I can’t stand what I can’t stand.
Miu...
She gets how Kaito feels, Takuma.

But Miu has feelings of her own. She doesn’t
want someone interfering in her life.

She’s not just some puppet dancing on her
brother’s strings.

Ah. Well, when you put it that way... My bad,
Miu, I wasn’t considering your feelings.
Um... It’s all right.
Do it, Shakomon!
What? Uh, me?

Come on, you think we should go for it, don’t
you, Shakomon? Ex-or-cise, ex-or-cise...

Uh, Miu? Y’know there’s a way to get rid of
that evil spirit without some scrap of paper.
Huh? What, what is it?

If I just open my shell here, and invite your
brother inside, then...
CHOMP!
Gone in one bite!

Wow, that’s genius! You’re incredible,
Shakomon!
Nyeheheh, let’s try it on Kaito next.
I’m down!

Um, things are dangerous enough around here
as it is...

At any rate, I’ll say something to your
brother. Try to lay off the bickering, okay?
I’ll try to try, at least...
...Hey, Takuma.
What?

I came here all clueless, and heck, I still
have no idea how I’m supposed to handle this.
It’d be nice if I knew anything at all...

(It’s only natural to get so anxious with so
little info to go on.)

(Maybe it’s less that she hates Kaito, and
more like she’s directing her fears at him.)

I’m seriously clueless here. It’d be nice if
I knew anything at all...
